scripts.patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "Update version:patch" && git push && npm publish
scripts.minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "Update version:minor" && git push && npm publish
scripts.major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "Update version:major" && git push && npm publish
